summary: A simple media sharing app where users can upload images and videos (max 2MB) stored on the Internet Computer with chunking. Files are private by default and can be shared via unique links. Moving away from Arweave to ICP storage.
architectural_notes: Backend uses Motoko with chunked storage for files up to 2MB
Files stored on Internet Computer, not Arweave
Privacy model: private by default, shareable via unique links
Supported media types: images and videos only
known_issues: This is the 5th attempt at building this app - previous versions had issues

existing_features.title: Remove all Arweave-related functionality including KeyfilePicker component, arweaveClient.ts library, and any Arweave transaction logic from UploadPage
Update UploadPage to directly upload files to the ICP backend with chunking support, showing upload progress with a progress bar
Generate unique shareable links for each uploaded file that allow public access without authentication
Update MyUploadsPage to display uploaded media with thumbnails, file sizes, upload dates, and copy-to-clipboard shareable link buttons

new_feature_requests.summary: Upload images and videos up to 2MB with chunking
Private media library for each user
Generate shareable links for uploaded media
Access shared files via links without login
Remove Arweave keyfile upload feature entirely
Implement chunked file upload in the backend for images and videos up to 2000KB (2MB), storing chunks in stable storage with automatic reassembly on download
Ensure uploaded files remain private to the uploader by default, only accessible via the user's uploads list in MyUploadsPage
